article_title: Hair Growth, Cell Death, And Too Much Saliva
article_text: Whether or not we keep our New Year's resolutions, our body still goes through visceral changes. From gallons of saliva and pee to inches of hair and fingernails, here's what will happen before the end of this year. Screen shot/World Science Festival
